mapper.select: /*총 좋아요 수*/ select count(*) from likeboard where boardnum=#{boardnum} and usernum=#{usernum}
/*좋아요상태: 좋아요가 눌러져있는지 안눌러져있는지*/ select likestate from likeboard where boardnum=#{boardnum} and usernum=#{usernum}
mapper.update: /*좋아요 수정*/ update likeboard set likestate=#{likestate} where boardnum=#{boardnum} and usernum=#{usernum}
mapper.select: /*좋아요 누른사람 출력*/ select usernum from likeboard where boardnum=#{boardnum} and likestate=1
